name: Crusty Beef Casserole
author: Shirley Boham
instructions: Cook ground beef and onion until meat is browned. Drain and stir in tomato sauce and chili powder. Spoon meat mixture into a greased 12 x 8 baking dish. Top with cheese and spoon beans over cheese. Prepare cornbread mix according to package directions; pour over the beans. Bake at 400Â° for 25 minutes or until cornbread is golden brown. Can use other types of beans also, like chili, red kidney or even blackeyed peas.
